ROM.Changelog:
# AIMROM OREO 8.1 Update :
-> Merged feb seurity patch -> Fixed Dark themeing issues -> Fixed recents missbehaviour -> Fixed LED lights switch -> Changed default thumb type -> Added AIMWALLS -> Added New Ringtones/sounds -> Added Ticker padding fix -> Added More Accent colors -> Added Framework Boost -> Added Quick unlock -> Fixed APPOPS crash -> Fixed QStiles NPE during boot -> Added Stubs for setcursor visibility -> Added Vibrate on plug -> Added Alert on charging level -> Added charging event sounds -> Added Battery image enable/disable -> Added reset battery stats -> Added Password orientation feature -> Added full substratum support (fixed bugs) -> Disable QS panel transparency -> Adaptive icons for all Systemapps -> More and More ...
#LetsAimify
---
# Note :
_Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._
